title: [build cop] One liner install build failed to find valid OpenPGP data

content.raw:
http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-xenial-amd64/41/console

```
+ sh -c apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80 --recv-keys D2486D2DD83DB69272AFE98867170598AF249743
Executing: /tmp/tmp.BU3YIgHtui/gpg.1.sh --keyserver
hkp://p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80
--recv-keys
D2486D2DD83DB69272AFE98867170598AF249743
gpg: requesting key AF249743 from hkp server p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net
gpgkeys: key D2486D2DD83DB69272AFE98867170598AF249743 can't be retrieved
gpg: no valid OpenPGP data found.
gpg: Total number processed: 0
gpg: keyserver communications error: keyserver helper general error
gpg: keyserver communications error: unknown pubkey algorithm
gpg: keyserver receive failed: unknown pubkey algorithm
Build step 'Execute shell' marked build as failure
[BFA] Scanning build for known causes...
[BFA] No failure causes found
[BFA] Done. 0s

```
